name: Playa Delfines
description: Known for its stunning public beach and the iconic 'Cancun' sign, perfect for photos. Offers beautiful views of the Caribbean.

name: Chichen Itza
description: An ancient Mayan city and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Home to the magnificent El Castillo pyramid, a wonder of the world.

name: Museo Maya de Cancun
description: A museum dedicated to Mayan culture, featuring a vast collection of artifacts and a beautifully designed exhibition space.

name: Tulum Ruins
description: The site of a pre-Columbian Mayan walled city, located on a dramatic bluff overlooking the Caribbean Sea.

name: Isla Mujeres
description: A tranquil island getaway famous for its pristine beaches, golf cart rentals, and great snorkeling spots like Garrafon Natural Reef Park.

name: Xcaret Park
description: An eco-archaeological park with underground rivers, Mayan ruins, and a variety of shows celebrating Mexican culture and nature.

name: Cenote Dos Ojos
description: A stunning cenote system with crystal-clear fresh water caves, perfect for snorkeling and cave diving.

name: La Isla Shopping Village
description: An open-air shopping mall with a beautiful canal, offering a mix of international brands, local boutiques, and excellent dining options.

name: Avenida Tulum
description: The main artery of downtown Cancun, known for its vibrant street art, local markets, and authentic Mexican restaurants.

name: Crococun Zoo
description: An interactive zoo where you can get up close with local wildlife, including crocodiles, monkeys, and snakes in their natural habitat.

name: El Rey Archaeological Zone
description: A smaller, but charming, set of Mayan ruins located within Cancun's hotel zone. A peaceful spot to learn about history and see wild iguanas.

name: Mercado 28
description: A bustling flea market in downtown Cancun where you can find handcrafted souvenirs, silver jewelry, and traditional clothing at great prices.

name: Cancun Underwater Museum (MUSA)
description: An incredible underwater sculpture museum. You can explore this unique art gallery by snorkeling, diving, or taking a glass-bottom boat tour.

name: Coco Bongo
description: A world-famous nightclub known for its spectacular live shows, acrobatics, and tribute performances to iconic artists. A high-energy experience.

name: Cancun Tower
description: Get a panoramic view of Cancun from the top of this 100-meter-tall rotating scenic tower, a must-do for photographers.
